title: x/exp/shiny/example/basic: alpha channel is ignored on windows
body:
The x/exp/shiny/example/basic looks like
![is](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9796621/12806973/1fae9440-cb5f-11e5-8744-81f72a4eb8bb.jpg)
but should look like
![expected](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/9796621/12806987/430f5c44-cb5f-11e5-9df7-db92f4a01750.jpg)

Alex
